com.bigdata.journal

Class AbstractMRMWTestCase.GroundTruth

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.journal.AbstractMRMWTestCase.GroundTruth
  • Enclosing class:
    AbstractMRMWTestCase

    public static class AbstractMRMWTestCase.GroundTruth
extends Object
    Class maintains ground truth for the store. Each AbstractMRMWTestCase.WriterTask stores the AbstractMRMWTestCase.Records that it writes here. The AbstractMRMWTestCase.ReaderTasks select and verify random ground truth AbstractMRMWTestCase.Records.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

      • getRandomData

        public ByteBuffer getRandomData(int reclen)
        Returns random data that will fit in N bytes. N is choosen randomly in 1:reclen.
        Returns:
        A new ByteBuffer wrapping a new byte[] of random length and having random contents.
